channel.title: Lol sorry im dumb but please help me im new :)
channel.description:
Hi my names i tyler and i am 15. i need a lil help how do I make my client save the ip that im hosting on so when i open it i can just log in?
and when i have my sever and sorce how do I make my source open with my client? cause when i get on my friends his source automaticly opens when i open the client.
when I post my client download and shit souhld i just take the user file out of the .rar and then upload it?
please help me I will rep.
and I am in need of a source that has alot (and i mean alot and it has to be 317) of customs and working spec please post a link I am begging you thank you! :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :) :D :D :D :) :) :) :) :) :D :D

item.title: Lol sorry im dumb but please help me im new :)
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

Well dude, the source isn’t what holds the Customs. The Client is. You have to hunch around for some models, and ints. Once you get the hang of adding models it’ll be easy.

Or an alternative

You can download a new client that already has the customs you want in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Lol sorry im dumb but please help me im new :)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Use this as your run.bat Change the directories

@echo off
color 40
cd DIRECTORY NAME FOR SERVER
START Java -Xmx1024m -cp .;mysql-connector.jar server
cd DIRECTORY NAME FOR CLIENT
START Java -Xmx500m EGUI
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Lol sorry im dumb but please help me im new :)
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

The source is only for you. Go into the your source folder and run your server. (It should be a batch file)

Then go into your client folder, run the client, then connect to your server at the login page.

Read full topic

item.description:

You have to run the server first (Should be a batch file). Then you should be able to connect to your server through your client.

As for your source folder opening when you open you client folder, I have no clue on how to do that.

item.title: Lol sorry im dumb but please help me im new :)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

how do I make my client save the ip that im hosting on so when i open it i can just log in?

Client.java in the client folder. Search for the old ip and replace it with the new. Also this should be in client help not server help.

and when i have my sever and sorce how do I make my source open with my client? cause when i get on my friends his source automaticly opens when i open the client.

Could you elaborate a bit more on that, im not sure I understand what your trying to do.

please help me I will rep.

You dont have the power to rep someone.

Read full topic
